title: Income and prices of goods double, no effect on Q

content.question: Assume that a consumer spends all her income on the purchase of two goods. If the consumerâ€™s income doubles and the prices of the two goods also double, the quantity of the two goods purchased will

choices.label: increase, but it will be less than double
depend on the slope of the demand curve

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
